input.sentences: for my boyfriend 's 25th birthday | i got a lot of friends together .
i made him a very funky cake | with blue frosting and lots of dots .
he loved the cake . he 's a cake guy . a birthday is n't a birthday without cake for him .
i used my finger to decorate him with frosting .
i love it that he knows how to have fun !
output.sentences: My birthday party included a lot of friends and my boyfriend.
Everyone knows how much I love chocolate cake so they got me one with lots of funky frosting on it.
I would never tell my boyfriend but I think I loved that cake more than I loved my guy that day.
My friends know it doesn't take much to please me so they opted for the inepensive cake decorating and used their fingers to write a message in the frosting
I love my friends and thanked them for making my birthday so fun.
